articles.title: Can the ANC reinvent itself after dismal South Africa election results? - BBC.com
articles.description: The ANC has dominated South Africa for the past 30 years but now it has to look to the future.
articles.content:
Barbara Plett-Usher,BBC Africa correspondent
South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa is under pressure after the disastrous election results
Mavuso Msimang read the writing on the wall last year a… [+7212 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: South Africa elections see ANC party, that freed country from apartheid, lose 30-year majority | Today News - Mint
articles.description: South Africa elections: With nearly 99% of votes counted, the once-dominant ANC had received just over 40% in the election on Wednesday. This was well short of the majority it had held since the famed all-race vote of 1994 that ended apartheid and brought it …
articles.content: The African National Congress party lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result Saturday that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since the end of the apart… [+3992 chars]
